mapper.insert: insert into test_resume (title, stu_name, stu_address, stu_address_detail, stu_phone, stu_email, stu_age, stu_certi_name, stu_gradyn, stu_jobstartdate, stu_jobenddate, stu_jobcompname, stu_joblevel, stu_jobjob, stu_jobwork, stu_awardname, stu_awardaward, stu_awardcompname, stu_emp_type, stu_interest, stu_wage, stu_id, user_id) values ( #{title}, #{stu_name}, #{stu_address}, #{stu_address_detail}, #{stu_phone}, #{stu_email}, #{stu_age}, #{stu_certi_name}, #{stu_gradyn}, #{stu_jobstartdate}, #{stu_jobenddate}, #{stu_jobcompname}, #{stu_joblevel}, #{stu_jobjob}, #{stu_jobwork}, #{stu_awardname}, #{stu_awardaward}, #{stu_awardcompname}, #{stu_emp_type}, #{stu_interest}, #{stu_wage}, #{stu_id}, #{user_id} )
